description:
website with list of suppliers of spare and/or wear parts of the item, if the original manufacturer has ceased their supply.
In some countries this may be requested by law.
If a manufacturer stops supplying spare or wear parts of a given item, the allocation of its constructional data to public by the manufacturer needs to be free of rights  in order to allow a third party to run the risk of their remanufacture (e.g. by 3D printer).

name.defaultValue: availability of parts after ceased supply by manufacturer

i18nValue.en_US: availability of parts after ceased supply by manufacturer
i18nValue.zh_CN: 制造商停止供应后零件的可用性
